
=================================================================
1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100017
     - Topic: Feedback Mechanisms
     - Question number: 7

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1146002
     - Topic: Stress at work
     - Question number: 7
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Stress at work

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role in this organization (e.g., manager, employee)?:** _______________
  - Executive / Senior Management: Yes; No: Please specify the position and department of management or leadership if not an executive level leader but still a supervisor over some team(s).
  	+ If yes then ask about their experience with stress at work. Are they stressed? How do you measure that, etc., because it is important to know how leaders feel as well so we can help them and the organization in general if there are any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach (or anything else).
  	+ If no then ask about their experience with stress at work. Are they stressed? How do you measure that, etc., because it is important to know how leaders feel as well so we can help them and the organization in general if there are any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach (or anything else).
  - Employee: Yes; No then ask about their experience with stress at work. Are they stressed? How do you measure that, etc., because it is important to know how employees feel as well so we can help them and the organization in general if there are any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach (or anything else).
  - Intern: Yes; No then ask about their experience with stress at work. Are they stressed? How do you measure that, etc., because it is important to know how interns feel as well so we can help them and the organization in general if there are any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach (or anything else).
  - Other: Please specify your role within this company. We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey, including contractors working on-site but not employed by us yet because they may have valuable insights into how we can improve things around here too! And if someone says "I don't know" then ask them what their job title would be so that I could better understand whether or not this person has enough information about the organization and its processes to answer all questions accurately.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how long have been working with us? And which department do they belong too (if it is possible)? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many hours per week do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many hours per day do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many days per week do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many days per month do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many days per year do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.
  - If you are a contractor, please specify how many months per year do they usually spend on the job? We want everyone who takes our questionnaire for stress at work survey including those people because we can learn from them as well and make improvements around here if there any issues or concerns related directly towards leadership style/approach.

[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Is the temperature in your workplace comfortable? (Please specify)** * Too hot*  	+   	- Not sure - 1.0 to +2.5 degrees Celsius is too warm for you, but not higher than that<br>     > Temperature below or above what range do you consider as uncomfortable and why.<br><hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;Too cold  	+   	- Not sure - 10 to +2.5 degrees Celsius is too cool for me, but not lower than that<br>     > Temperature below or above what range do you consider as uncomfortable and why.<br><hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;Comfortable  	+    Completely comfortable with the temperature in my workplace. <br>&nbsp;\
**Do your workstation/desk have enough space? (Please specify)** * Yes, I can easily move around<br>     > Describe how much more room you need and why.<hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;No  	+    The area of the desk is too small for me. <br>&nbsp;\
**Do your colleagues respect personal space? (Please specify)** * Yes, they do not enter my workspace<br>     > Describe how much more room you need and why.<hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;No  	+    They often come into the area where I work. <br>&nbsp;\
**Do your colleagues keep their personal items in a designated place? (Please specify)** * Yes, they do<br>     > Describe how much more room you need and why.<hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;No  	+    They leave things all over the area where I work. <br>&nbsp;\
**Is there enough light for your tasks in this workplace? (Please specify)** * Yes, it is perfect<br>     > Describe how much more or less lighting you need and why.<hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;No  	+    The place does not have the right amount of illumination. <br>&nbsp;\
**Do your colleagues keep their personal items in a designated area? (Please specify)** * Yes, they do<br>     > Describe how much more room you need and why.<hr>\
&nbsp;&nbsp;No  	+    They leave things all over the place where I work. <br>&nbsp;\

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1213249
     - Topic: Training effectiveness
     - Question number: 2

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1173001
     - Topic: Remote working experience
     - Question number: 10
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Remote working experience

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Remote Working Experience Questionnaire:**
 1: How often do you work remotely? (Always / Sometimes)
- If "Sometimes" - What percentage of your time is spent remote, and what factors influence this decision to make it less than complete remoting.
2: Do the tools provided by company meet all needs for efficient working from home or need some improvement in that regard ? 	(Yes/No). Please specify if no! If yes please rate how much on scale of one-ten (10 being maximum) and suggest improvements as well .  3: How do you feel about your work environment at the office compared to remote?
    - I prefer working from home. It is more comfortable, convenient or less stressful than an in person workplace setting 	(Strongly Agree / Somewhat agree/Neutral)     OR     50% of time spent on this activity should be done remotely for you and not at office
    - I prefer working from the Office. It is more comfortable, convenient or less stressful than a remote work setting ( Strongly disagree /Some what Disagree ) 4: How do your colleagues treat while communicating with them in terms of responsiveness? Please rate on scale one-ten and specify if not enough then why ?
5 : Do you feel isolated from team members due to lack or less communication than office environment OR Not at all (Yes/No) If yes please suggest ways for better integration. 6: How do your productivity change in terms of remote working? Please rate on scale one-ten and specify if not enough then why ?
7 : Do you feel that the company has provided sufficient support to make transition smooth from office environment OR Not at all (Yes/No) If no please suggest ways for better integration. 8: How do your personal life is affected by remote working? Please rate on scale one-ten and specify if not enough then why ?
9 : Do you feel that the company has provided sufficient support to make transition smooth from office environment OR Not at all (Yes/No) If no please suggest ways for better integration. 10: How do your personal life is affected by remote working? Please rate on scale one-ten and specify if not enough then why ?
    - I feel that my productivity has increased as a result of being able to work from home, with fewer distractions (Strongly Agree / Somewhat agree/Neutral) 	OR     50% or more time spent on this activity should be done remotely for you and not at office
    - I feel that my productivity has decreased as a result of being able to work from home, with fewer distractions (Strongly disagree /Some what Disagree )  12: How do your personal life is affected by remote working? Please rate on scale one-ten and specify if not enough then why ?
    - I feel that my productivity has increased as a result of being able to work from home, with fewer distractions (Strongly Agree / Somewhat agree/Neutral) 	OR     50% or more time spent on this activity should be done remotely for you and not at office
    - I feel that my productivity has decreased as a result of being able to work from home, with fewer distractions (Strongly disagree /Some what Disagree )  13: Do your personal habits or routines change in terms on remote working? Please rate them out 5 and specify if not enough then why ?
    - I feel that my personality has changed as a result of being able to work from home, with fewer distractions (Strongly Agree / Somewhat agree/Neutral)  	OR     70% or more time spent on this activity should be done remotely for you and not at office

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Please rate your manager's ability in providing constructive and actionable criticism.**
  - Very good at it (6)
   1. My manager is very skilled when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well. This helps me understand what needs changing so that we can both grow together as a team and individually too! 2-3 times per month this happens
    - Good at it (5)
     1. My manager is able when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well once or twice in three months but not always though... It's important! 2-3 times per year this happens
    - Average at it (4)
     1. My manager is average when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well once or twice in six months but not always though... It's important! 2-3 times per year this happens
    - Not very good at it (3)
     1. My manager is below average when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well once or twice in twelve months but not always though... It's important! 2-4 times per year this happens
    - Not good at it (2)
     1. My manager is poor when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well once or twice in a longer period than twelve months but not always though... It's important! Less then 4 times per year this happens (rarely)
    - Very bad at it(1) My manager is terrible when giving critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well never or almost not ever. This has a very negative impact on me and makes feel unimportant in team! 0-3 times per year this happens
    - Never experienced (0) My manager is someone who hasn't given critical yet positive comments about my work, making sure to highlight areas for improvement while also acknowledging the things I did well. This has a very negative impact on me and makes feel unimportant in team! 	Please provide your answer as integer number between zero(not experienced)and six (very good at it).
  -------------------
    - **How often does feedback come from manager?** Once per month or less, once every two weeks are the options. Please rate on scale of one to five where: One is very bad and Five means excellent! 	Please provide your answer as integer number between zero(not experienced)and six (very good at it).
  -------------------
    - **Do you feel that feedback from manager helps in personal growth?** Yes or no. If yes, please rate on scale of one to five where: One is very bad and Five means excellent! 	Please provide your answer as integer number between zero(not experienced)and six (very good at it).
  -------------------
    - **Do you feel that feedback from manager helps in professional growth?** Yes or no. If yes, please rate on scale of one to five where: One is very bad and Five means excellent! 	Please provide your answer as integer number between zero(not experienced)and six (very good at it).
  -------------------
     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Manager feedback

[LLM ANSWER]
**How satisfied are you with your current career? (Please rate it from the following options)**
- Very Satisfied
- Somewhat satisifed
- Neither happy nor unhappy about my job, but I would like to change some things. This is not a bad place for me right now and there's room of improvement though! It could be better with certain changes in responsibilities or work environment etc.. But it can also stay as good too if those aspects are kept same
- Somewhat dissatisfied, but I am willing to change my career path. However the reason behind this is not because job itself rather something else like working hours and commuting time which makes me feel uncomfortable sometimes due its long duration or maybe salary that doesn't meet expectations etc.. But if those things were addressed then it would be fine
- Very dissatisfied, I am actively looking for a new career path. The reason behind this is not just one thing but multiple factors like work environment and colleagues; responsibilities which do no align with my values or skills set required doesn't match mine etc.. So yes very unhappy about current situation! 
**Do you feel that your job matches well to the rest of who are? (Please rate it from following options)**
- Strongly agree, I am in perfect fit for this role and organization. It feels like everything has been designed just right so as soon as step into shoes they stick perfectly without any adjustments needed at all! 
- Agree: This job is a good match with me but there might be some small things which could make it better such that I would feel more comfortable or satisfied if only those were addressed then everything else falls in place. But overall this position matches well to my personality and skills set required for success too..! 
- Neither agree nor disagree: This job is neither good match not bad either, just neutral about whole concept of matching career path with person itself because it's hard sometimes tell whether someone will succeed even though they seem perfect on paper or in reality. But still there are chances to become great fit if certain conditions met!
- Somewhat Disagree: This job is somewhat match but not exactly what I was looking for, so some adjustments could be made either by changing responsibilities slightly OR giving more autonomy over decisions which would make me feel happier and engaged in position. But still this role has potential to become great fit with little effort!
- Strongly disagree: This job is definitely NOT match at all no matter how hard I try, it just doesn't work out for some reason even though everything else seems fine like skills set or personality traits etc.. So yes strongly feel that not a good career path choice. 
**Do you think your current role provides enough opportunities to learn and grow? (Please rate)**
- Strongly agree: Yes, this job has provided ample opportunity for growth both personally as well professionally through various training programs or workshops which helped me expand my knowledge base significantly beyond what was expected initially! So yes strongly feel that there are plenty of chances available here. 
- Agree : This role does provide enough opportunities but could be better if only certain aspects were addressed like providing more autonomy over decisions, allowing to work from home occasionally or having clear career path within organization which would help me see where I am going and how long it will take for reaching there too! But still agree that learning is possible here.
- Neither Agree nor disagree: This role neither provides enough opportunities not lacks them either because sometimes its hard tell whether someone can learn from certain situation or position, but if only given chance then definitely would be able to pick up new skills and abilities which could make me even better employee in future! 
- Somewhat Disagree : While this job does provide some learning it's not quite enough for my needs as I am always looking forward towards expanding horizons by taking on challenging tasks or projects that push limits of comfort zone. But still there are chances available here if only given opportunity to prove myself and showcase what capable doing!
- Strongly disagree: No, this job does NOT provide any opportunities at all for learning new things because it's just not right fit from beginning due various reasons like lack of resources or support needed succeeding in role. So yes strongly feel that there are no chances here to become better person and employee too..!
**Do you think your current career path is sustainable? (Please rate)** 
- Strongly agree: Yes, this job feels very stable with good prospects for future as well because it matches my skills set perfectly which makes me confident about its sustainability. So yes strongly feel that there are no issues in near term or long run regarding how things will go on!

 1. How do you currently assess training needs within your organization? Is it based solely on job requirements or also includes the development of employees in their roles as well? Please explain with examples if possible! (Multiple Choice) a). Based only on Job Requirements b). Both c). Development focused d). Other
 2. How do you measure effectiveness and impact after training programs are implemented within your organization, including any metrics or evaluation methods used to determine success of the program(s)? Please explain with examples if possible! (Multiple Choice) a.) Not measured at all - just happy that it's done b ). Based on participant feedback c). Quantitative data collected d. Other
 3. How do you ensure training programs are accessible and available for employees who need them? Are there any barriers to access or availability, such as time constraints of the workday/week in which participants can attend sessions (Multiple Choice) a.) Only when necessary b). Always c). Depends on budget d ). Other

[LLM ANSWER]
**The content of the training was too complicated and hard to understand.**
- Completely Disagree (1)  Totally agree(5). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Strongly agree(5). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Agree a little(2). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Agree a lot(4). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Totally agree(5). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Agree a little(2). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet
- Completely Disagree (1)  Agree a lot(4). Please specify your answer. 0 - Not sure, I need more information about this topic or question before giving an opinion on it; not positive nor negative but neutral in some way because the person is unsure of what they think yet

[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500000005
     - Topic: Course feedback
     - Question number: 5
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Course feedback

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **On scale from 1-5, how would rate your overall satisfaction with this course? (1 being very unsatisfied and 5 being completely satisfied)**
 - Very dissatisfied: *Please specify reasons*
   	+ ...
   - Dissatisfied: *Specify if possible the reason of discontentment.*
     +...
- Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied. The course could be better, but I am not sure what to improve yet.: **What would you change about this Course?** 
   	+ ...
   - Satisfied with some room for improvement: *Please specify areas that need improvements.*
     +...
- Completely satisfied and think the content is useful. How can we maintain your satisfaction level in future courses?:*Specify factors contributing to a satisfying experience, please? And what could be done differently next time around course delivery or structure perhaps ?*. 	+ ...
   - Very Satisfied: *Please specify reasons for being very satisfied with the Course.*
     +...
**How well did this course meet your expectations and goals?: (1=not met at all,5 =met completely)**- Not Met At All : **What do you think is missing in order to reach that goal?**. 	+ ...
   - Somewhat: *Please specify what was not fully understood or implemented properly.*
   0 Meeting Mostly But Lacked A Few Aspects To Meet Completely. How can we make sure all aspects are covered next time?: **What areas need more attention in your opinion?** 	+ ...- Met to Some Extent: *Please specify what was missing for this goal not being met completely.*
   0 Meeting But Needed More Attention In Certain Areas To Fully Meet The Goal. How can we make sure all aspects are covered next time?: **What areas need more attention in your opinion?** 	+ ...- Met Completely: *Please specify what made this goal meet completely.*
   0 Meeting And Exceeded Expectations, Please Specify What Made This Course So Great ? :*Specific factors that contributed to exceeding expectations and how can we implement them again for future courses*. +...**How would you rate the course materials used in class? (1=not useful at all 5 =completely agree)**- Not Useful At All: *Please specify what made this material not usable*
   - Somewhat : **What was missing or unclear that prevented full understanding of concept ?** + ...	+...- Completily Useless. How can we make sure materials are more relatable and understandble next time? 0 Not Useful: *Please specify what made this material not usable*

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 5100003

     - Question number: 9
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User:

[LLM ANSWER]
 **How would you rate your accessibility of technology in the workplace out of five stars.** *1 star = Not accessible at all* 5 Stars= Completely Satisfied with availability. Please answer using one-star system (either not available or completely satisfied) for each question below:
   - Availability and reliability to use computer/laptop?
   	+ Computer / Laptops are provided by the company, but theyre often broken! = 2 stars
     OR Computers work perfectly fine. I don't have any complaints about them=5 Stars
- Is there a reliable internet connection in your workplace to do daily tasks and activities? (Please answer using one star system)	+ Internet is not stable at all, so its hard for me to complete my job = 2 stars OR It works perfectly fine. I don't have any complaints about the network=5 Stars

  - Executive/Senior Management

[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your current job title within the company? Please select from this list:**
- Junior Developer / Engineer (Software, Electrical etc.)
  - Quality Assurance Specialist
  - Technical Writer or Documentation specialist
  - IT Support Professional I and II levels
  - DevOps/MLOps engineer
  - Data Scientist
  - Network Administrator
- Other: Please specify the job title in a comment field.
  ---------------------
**How long have you been with your current team? (Please select one of these options)**
- Less than six months
- Six Months to One year
- More than two years, but less then five years
  - Five or more Years

[Select the option that applies]  ---------------------   ---------------    --------------     -------------        ---------
**Do you feel like your current role is giving enough opportunities for career growth? (Please select one of these options)**
- Yes definitely! I am constantly learning and growing.
  - Somewhat, but there are still areas where more chances could be provided to me as a professional in this field or industry specifics that limit my abilities at the moment within certain tasks/projects etc., which is not ideal because it prevents full potential from being reached; however overall feeling positive about opportunities given so far.
  - No, I don't feel like there are enough chances for career growth and learning new things in this role or team setup currently configured by management decisions made without me having a say on them directly affecting my performance negatively thus preventing any progress towards higher positions within company structure due to lack of resources allocated such as time training budget etc.
  ---------------------   ---------------    --------------     -------------        ---------  **Do you feel that your current role is providing enough opportunities for professional development? (Please select one option)**
- Yes, definitely! I am constantly learning and growing through various means including workshops/courses which align with my career goals making me better at what i do every day.
   - Somewhat yes but there are still areas where more chances could be provided to improve skills in certain technical or soft ones that would help overall performance of the team if given properly, however feeling positive about opportunities for growth so far without much input on how they should happen other than general direction set by management decisions made with me having a say directly affecting my abilities negatively thus preventing any progress towards higher positions within company structure due to lack resources allocated such as time training budget etc.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do You feel that there is clear career path in your current role within the company ?** 	- Yes, definitely.   - Somewhat yes but could be improved    - Not sure about it     - No not at all     

**Have you received a detailed explanation of how to progress along this Career Path? **        - Strongly agree         - Agree             - Neither aggre nor disagree           - Disagree                - strongly disage  	

**Do You feel that the company provides enough opportunities for career growth and development ?**    - Yes, definitely.     - Somewhat yes but could be improved      - Not sure about it        - No not at all

     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.

Generate me a questionnaire on Career Path Clarity

[LLM ANSWER]
 **How clear do you feel about your career path in this organization is right now ? (1 being very unclear, 5being neutral and 7-10 becoming more certain)** - Not at all Clear: 1 or 2; Slightly Cleaer :3 ; Neutral/Undecided:4
or 5; Somewhat clear but not fully convinced yet:6 to 9. Fully Convinced about my career path in this organization and feel very satisfied with it - Completely Clear (7,8 or10) **Do you think your current role is a stepping stone for reaching higher positions?**
- Yes; Definitely! I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well.- Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet - No, this position doesnt feel like it can lead anywhere else in my career **Do you think your current role is aligned with where YOU want YOUR CAREER TO GO?**
- Yes; I am very happy that the company has provided me a perfect place to grow and learn. This job aligns well both professionally aswell personally for ME! - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is aligned with where THE COMPANY WANTS TO GO?**
- Yes; I am confident that the company has provided me a perfect place to grow and learn. This job aligns well both professionally aswell for ME! - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you feel like your current role is preparing YOU FOR THE FUTURE?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you feel like your current role is preparing THE COMPANY FOR A SUCCESSFUL FUTURE?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is a good fit for YOUR PERSONALITY?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is a good fit for THE COMPANY'S CULTURE?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is a good fit for THE COMPANY'S STRATEGY?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is a good fit for THE COMPANY'S VALUES?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No **Do you think your current role is a good fit for THE COMPANY'S CLIENTELE?**
- Yes; I am confident that the next step will be up. This job has given me many opportunities to grow professionally and personally as well - Somewhat yes but not fully convinced yet, need more time or resources/support from management.- No

=================================================================
1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1173004
     - Topic: Manager feedback
     - Question number: 3

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100012
     - Topic: Employee motivation
     - Question number: 5
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Employee motivation

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Employees Motivation Questionaire:**
 1. On a scale of 0-5, how motivated do they feel when coming into work? (Please provide average score)
2. Is there any specific factor that makes them more engaged and productive at their job? If yes - what is it? Please specify the factors in order to understand better which ones are most important for our team members' motivation level increase, as well how we can implement those elements into everyday workflow without causing extra pressure or stress.
3. Do they feel like management cares about them personally and professionally (please provide an average score)? If not - what steps should be taken in order to make employees understand that their opinions matter? How often do you think it is necessary for managers/supervisors communicate with team members on a personal level, just asking how everything's going or discussing some plans outside of work-related topics.
4. Is there any specific reward system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - does this method seem effective? Which rewards do employees prefer most and why those are considered more valuable than others by team members themselves, not only management but also their peers in terms who gets recognized for good work done on regular basis
5. Is there any specific training provided to help people perform better at job (please specify)? If yes - how often is this happening? Does it feel like enough or too little and why so many employees might want more opportunities of growth through education, not just once but several times per year if possible in order for them reach maximum potential.
6. Is there any specific communication style that makes people motivated to work harder (please specify)? If yes - what is it? How can we implement this type approach into everyday conversations with team members without causing extra pressure or stress, making sure everyone feels comfortable speaking up when something bothers him/her and sharing positive feedback as well.
7. Is there any specific goal setting process implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how often are goals set? Are they achievable for most people on team without causing extra pressure or stress, making sure everyone understands what needs to be done in order reach those objectives and feels motivated enough by management as well their peers.
8. Is there any specific feedback system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how often is this happening? Does it feel like enough for employees not just once but several times per year if possible, making sure everyone has chance to express themselves freely and understand what they need in order improve their performance at work
9. Is there any specific recognition system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how often is this happening? Does it feel like enough for employees not just once but several times per year if possible, making sure everyone has chance to express themselves freely and understand what they need in order improve their performance at work
10. Is there any specific empowerment system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how often is this happening? Does it feel like enough for employees not just once but several times per year if possible, making sure everyone has chance to express themselves freely and understand what they need in order improve their performance at work
11. Is there any specific autonomy system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how often is this happening? Does it feel like enough for employees not just once but several times per year if possible, making sure everyone has chance to express themselves freely and understand what they need in order improve their performance at work
12. Is there any specific communication channel that makes people motivated (please specify)? If yes - how can we implement this type of approach into everyday conversations with team members without causing extra pressure or stress? How often should managers/supervisors communicate using preferred method, making sure everyone feels comfortable speaking up when something bothers him/her and sharing positive feedback as well.
13. Is there any specific work-life balance system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how does management ensure that people have enough time for themselves outside of working hours? How often do you think it is necessary to check in with team members on this topic, just asking if everything's okay and making sure everyone understands what they need from organization point view.
14. Is there any specific employee motivation system implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how does management ensure that people feel motivated at work? How often is it necessary to check in with team members on this topic, just asking if everything's okay and making sure everyone understands what they need from organization point view.
15. Is there any specific system of motivation for employees implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how does management ensure that people feel motivated at work? How often is it necessary to check in with team members on this topic, just asking if everything's okay and making sure everyone understands what they need from organization point view.
16. Is there any specific system of motivation for employees implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how does management ensure that people feel motivated at work? How often is it necessary to check in with team members on this topic, just asking if everything's okay and making sure everyone understands what they need from organization point view.
17. Is there any specific system of motivation for employees implemented within the company (please specify)? If yes - how does management ensure that people feel motivated at work? How often is it necessary to check in with team members on this topic, just asking if everything's okay and making sure everyone understands what they need from organization point view.
18-20: Please provide three open ended questions for employees about their motivation level (please specify) - we would like them feel comfortable sharing personal opinions without feeling judged or pressured by management team members themselves, not only supervisors but also peers in terms who gets recognized more often than others.
Please let us know if there is anything else you need from our side! We are always here to help and make sure your organization runs smoothly with motivated workforce ready for any challenge ahead of them all the time
     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Employee motivation

     - Question number: 10
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Employee Performance

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Does this employee have clear goals? (Yes or No)** If not, why and what could be done to help them establish these objectives. 10 point scale for the answer: *If yes = 9-10* / *if no=6*-7*/

**How often does your Employee meet their performance targets in a given period? (Yes or No)** If not, why and what could be done to help them achieve these goals. Use this scale for the answer: */If yes = 9-10/* / *if no=6*-7*/*

**Is there any room left for improvement after meeting their performance targets in a given period? (Yes or No)** If not, why and what could be done to help them improve further. Use this scale for the answer: */If yes = 9-10/* / *if no=6*-7*/*

**How does your employee handle criticism about their performance from colleagues/supervisors? (Yes or No)** If not, why and what could be done to help them improve on receiving feedback. Use this scale for the answer: */If yes = 9-10/* / *if no=6*-7*/*

**How does your employee react when given a challenging task that is out of their comfort zone? (Yes or No)** If not, why and what could be done to help them improve on accepting challenges. Use this scale for the answer: */If yes = 9-10/* / *if no=6*-7*/*
```vbnet
What are your employee's strengths in terms of performance? (Multiple choice) a/ Clear communicator b/ Detail oriented c/ Proactive d/ Team player e/ Strategic thinker f/ Other: ________  g / Does not have any significant strength. Please specify other if chosen, otherwise use the scale from before
```

With only the questionnaire TOPIC

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100062
     - Topic: Workplace Culture
     - Question number: 8

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100016
     - Topic: Feedback Mechanisms
     - Question number: 5
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Feedback Mechanisms

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **How often do you receive performance-related and constructive criticism? (1 being never, 5 is average)**
	* Never
	* Rarely - once per year at most
    * Twice or three times in six months but not a regular basis.
    * Regularly every month during appraisal meetings with manager/supervisor.
    	- Every week for specific tasks and projects that I am working on, as part of the process to improve my performance skills further by getting feedback from team members who are evaluating me in order to become better employee within organization or company where i work currently which is very important aspect because it helps employees learn new things about themselves while also helping them grow professionally and personally.
	* Other (please specify) - 10 different options for this one, including: daily but not necessarily formal; during performance reviews with manager/supervisor or in team meetings where everyone can hear each other's opinions openly without any fear of judgment because it is encouraged to share thoughts freely which leads better understanding among colleagues and helps them work together more efficiently.
	* Dont know / Prefer Not To Answer (DN) - This question does not apply for some reason or I am unable answer due lack knowledge about frequency/type feedback received in current job position, so please provide another option if possible because this is important metric when evaluating employee's performance and growth within organization.

**Do the employees have a clear understanding of what is expected from them? (Yes/No)** 	 - Yes, they do  
    - No    

**How often are performance evaluations and feedback provided to team members within your department or company-wide on average: more than once per year; at least twice but not always the same time of day / week etc.; only during annual review? Please specify.** 	 - More then one  
    - Atleast two times,but never exactly in this format/time

        -No

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 5100002
     - Topic: Training to professional users
     - Question number: 12

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100018
     - Topic: Feedback Mechanisms
     - Question number: 9
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Feedback Mechanisms

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do the current feedback mechanisms in place allow for adequate communication between team members and supervisors, or is there room for improvement? Please specify.**
- Strongly agree (5) / Agree(4)/ Neutral/(3)/ Disagree(/2/)Strong disagree (-1). 0=Neither. If you select anything other than strongly agrees please provide a comment on how to improve it! :) Thanks in advance!! :D <br>
**Do the feedback mechanisms allow for constructive criticism? [SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500000005

[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Health and Safety Measures

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do these health & safety measures make sense to YOU:**
  1. Do they seem reasonable or excessive in your opinion? Please specify why you think so for each measure mentioned below: (Yes / No) 	
    - Washing hands with soap before touching food and after using the restroom is a must-have hygiene practice, isn't it?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that wearing masks in public places can help prevent diseases? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	
    - What about keeping at least six feet away from others to avoid spreading germs and viruses through the air, do they seem reasonable or excessive?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU consider that limiting gatherings of people in public places is a good idea? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	
    - Is it important for YOUR health to have accessibility and availability checks on all equipment, tools & machinery used at work?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that having an emergency response plan in case of any accident is a must-have safety measure? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular health checks and screenings for employees, even if they don't show symptoms?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that providing hand sanitizers in all workplaces is a good idea? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular cleaning and disinfection of the workplace, including offices & meeting rooms for your health?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that providing protective equipment like gloves or goggles is a must-have safety measure? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular training sessions on hygiene, infection prevention and other related topics for all employees?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that providing health & wellness programs is a good idea in the workplace? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular testing of air quality at workplaces, including offices and meeting rooms for your safety?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that providing ergonomic furniture is a must-have in the workplace? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular testing of water quality at workplaces, including offices and meeting rooms for your safety?: Yes/No  
    1. Do YOU agree that providing vaccination against diseases is a good idea in the workplace? Please specify why you think so: (Yes / No) 	    - Is it important to have regular testing of noise levels at workplaces, including offices and meeting rooms for your safety?: Yes/No

     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.

Generate me a questionnaire on Health and Safety Measures

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role in this organization? Please select one:**
  - Executive / Senior Management (CEO, CFO etc.)
    * Manager of any department. For example: HSE manager or not an HSE manager)
      + Employee at the front line and supervisor for a specific area/department but NOT in charge with Health & Safety responsibilities directly related to your role within this company (not even as part time). Please select another option if that is true. 	- Other: __________________ If you selected "Other" please specify which department or position
    - **Do the current health and safety measures implemented by management meet national standards?** Yes, they do No, not sure Do NOT agree with them (please provide reason) Please select only one answer from this question. 	- How often are accidents/incidents reported in your company per year: ________________
    - **Do you believe that the health and safety measures implemented by management can be improved?** Yes, they definitely need improvement No, not really Sure about it but there is a room for more attention to detail. Please select only one answer from this question 	- Are your co workers informed of all necessary procedures in case something goes wrong or an emergency happens at the workplace: Always In most cases Sometimes Rarely Never

Generate me a questionnaire on Health and Safety Measures

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do you feel safe in your work environment with regards to health concerns? (Please specify)** 	- Yes, I always felt completely safe. - Sometimes yes but there is still room for improvement. - No not at all because of the lack or poor quality equipment provided by my company and it's management

**Do you think that our current safety measures are enough to keep employees healthy? (Please specify)** 	- Yes, I believe we have everything needed in order stay safe from harm while working here. - Somewhat not sure if all the risks of getting injured or sick on job has been eliminated yet but it's close!
   - No because there is still a lot to be done and management should pay more attention for employees safety, health & well-being . 	
**Do you think that our current first aid facilities are adequate? (Please specify)** 	- Yes I believe we have all the necessary tools in order provide medical help if someone gets hurt or sick. - Somewhat not sure because there is always a chance for something to go wrong and management should be more prepared .
   - No, it's very obvious that our first aid facilities are lacking some essential equipment which could put employees at risk of getting injured even worse ! 	
**Do you think the company provides enough information about health risks? (Please specify)** 	- Yes I believe we have been given all necessary details and resources in order to stay safe from harm. - Somewhat not sure because it's hard for me say if everyone has access or knowledge of everything they need but most likely yes .
   - No, the company should provide more information about health risks associated with work environment as well how can we prevent them! 	
**Do you think that our current safety measures are effective in preventing accidents? (Please specify)** 	- Yes I believe all necessary steps have been taken to make sure no one gets hurt or sick while working here. - Somewhat not completely but it's close and management should continue making improvements .  
    - No, the company can do more by providing better equipment as well educating employees on how they could prevent accidents from happening in first place ! 	
**Do you think that our current safety measures are effective enough to keep everyone safe? (Please specify)** 	- Yes I believe we have everything needed for all of us stay out harm's way. - Somewhat not sure because it only takes one mistake or misstep and someone could get hurt but most likely yes .
   - No, the company should put more effort into making work environment safer place where everyone can feel comfortable working without worrying about getting injured !

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Have you ever been offered an internal mobility opportunity within this organization before today?(Yes or No)** If yes, please specify how many times and when. Otherwise continue to the next questions:) 
**Do You Think That The Company Provides Enough Information About Internal Mobility Opportunities? (1 being very dissatisfied with information provided about internal mobility opportunities;5 Being completely satisfied.) **

(1 being very dissatisfied with training provided for internal mobility opportunities;5 Being completely satisfied.) ** Strongly agree, Agree , Neutral / not sure/ Disagree or strongly disagree.
**Do You Think That The Company Provides Enough Support To Employees During Internal Mobility Process? (1 being very dissatisfied with support provided for internal mobility opportunities;5 Being completely satisfied.) ** Strongly agree, Agree , Neutral / not sure/ Disagree or strongly disagree.
**Do You Know The Steps And Procedure For Applying To An Intracompany Job Posting? (1 being very dissatisfied with procedure for internal mobility opportunities;5 Being completely satisfied.) ** Strongly agree, Agree , Neutral / not sure/ Disagree or strongly disagree.
**Do You Think That The Company Provides Enough Support To Employees After They Have Moved Internally? (1 being very dissatisfied with support provided for internal mobility opportunities;5 Being completely satisfied.) ** Strongly agree, Agre , Neutral / not sure/ Disagree or strongly disagree.

The questions are asking whether internal mobility opportunities should be available for all employees, and whether the employee feels qualified for internal mobility.  **What is your role in this organization (e.g., executive or manager)?** 	Manager, Employee, Other - please specify: ________________. If you are an external consultant working with the company for only one day per week and do not consider yourself as part of a team then answer "External Consultant".

**How long have you been employed by this organization? (Please choose from options below)** 	Less than six months, Six to twelve-month period or More. If your response is 'More', please specify how many years: ________. Otherwise if less than a year then answer "Not Applicable".

**Have you ever received any promotion within the company? (Please choose from options below)** 	Yes and No, otherwise N/A - not applicable. If yes has been promoted more or once since working with this organization: ________. Otherwise if no please specify how many times have NOT BEEN PROMOTED in your current role as an employee of the company (please choose from options below): 0 Times and More than zero but less then five, Five to ten years.

**Do you feel that this organization provides fair opportunities for career growth? Please select one option:** Yes - Completely or Somewhat Not Sure if yes please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If no is your answer choose from options below; No and N/A (not applicable).

**Do you feel that the company has a positive work environment? Please select one option:** Yes - Completely or Somewhat Not Sure if yes please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If no is your answer choose from options below; No and N/A (not applicable). 	

**Do you feel that the company has a positive work environment? Please select one option:** Yes - Completely or Somewhat Not Sure if yes please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If no is your answer choose from options below; No and N/A (not applicable). 	

**Do you feel that the company has a positive work environment? Please select one option:** Yes - Completely or Somewhat Not Sure if yes please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If no is your answer choose from options below; No and N/A (not applicable). 	

**Do you feel that the company has a positive work environment? Please select one option:** Yes - Completely or Somewhat Not Sure if yes please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If no is your answer choose from options below; No and N/A (not applicable). 	
Please rate on scale of zero to ten, where Zero means not satisfied at all with the work environment. Ten indicates completely happy or very positive about it - please specify how many times have been promoted: ________. If you are an external consultant then answer "Not Applicable".

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do the leaders in our organization inspire trust and confidence among employees, customers or stakeholders? If so why not how can we improve this situation.**
- Strongly agree / Somewhat disagree (scale) 10 questions total. Adding up all answers to get a final score for leadership effectiveness of your company's current set leaders in the organization on scale from -5 and +2 where negative numbers indicate lack or absence, while positive ones show presence: From this number we can say if it is above certain threshold that our Leaders are effective.
- Is there any specific leader who stands out as particularly good at motivating people? If so why do you think they excel in motivation and how could their techniques be replicated across the organization to increase overall leadership effectiveness of all leaders within your company's ecosystem ? (scale) 10 questions total with same scale.
- Do our current set Leaders communicate effectively, clearly setting goals for themselves as well others? If not why do you think there is a communication barrier and how can it be improved across the organization to increase overall leadership effectiveness of all leaders within your company's ecosystem ? (scale) 10 questions total with same scale.
- Do our current set Leaders inspire people, creating an environment where everyone feels comfortable sharing ideas? If not why do you think there is a lack or absence and how can it be improved across the organization to increase overall leadership effectiveness of all leaders within your company's ecosystem ? (scale) 10 questions total with same scale.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **On a scale from 1-5, how would you rate your current leaders effectiveness in their role as manager (within the context of this company)? Please provide specific examples if possible.**
   - Very poor: I have serious concerns about my boss' ability to lead and manage. They do not seem able or willing to listen effectively; they may be too controlling, unaware that a different approach is needed for each situation/person (1) 
   	- Poor: My leader has some issues with their management style but there are signs of improvement on the horizon - I believe my boss will get better if given time and support. They might struggle to adapt in certain situations or when managing specific people, however they do have potential as a manager within this company (2)
   	- Average: My leader is neither good nor bad at their job; there are some positive aspects but also areas where my boss could improve - I think with the right support and guidance from HR/higher management that we can help them become more effective in managing people, projects or processes. (3)
   	- Good: My leader is a competent manager who has good relationships within their team; they are able to provide necessary resources for success but could still improve on certain aspects of communication and empathy - I think with some training from HR/higher management we can help them become even better (4)
   	- Very Good: My leader is an excellent manager who knows how best manage people, projects or processes; they are able to provide necessary resources for success while also being a great communicator and empathetic towards their team. I believe my boss has the ability not only maintain this level of performance but improve further with support from HR/higher management (5)
   	- Exceptional: My leader is an exceptional manager who knows how best manage people, projects or processes; they are able to provide necessary resources for success while also being a great communicator and empathetic towards their team. I believe my boss has the ability not only maintain this level of performance but improve further with support from HR/higher management (6)
   	- Unsure: Not sure about leader's effectiveness in managing people, projects or processes; they may be a new manager who needs time to adjust and learn how best manage their team. I believe that my boss can become an effective manager if given the right support from HR/higher management (7)
   	- Other: Please specify reason for rating leader's effectiveness as "other" than 1,2,3,4 or5; please provide specific examples and suggestions to improve their leadership skills. Thank you! (- - )

[LLM ANSWER]

[LLM ANSWER]
 **On a scale from 1-5, how would you rate your overall experience with our company's new employee orientation program (onboarding)? Please provide specific reasons for the rating.**
 - Strongly disagree: I did not like it at all. The process was confusing and unhelpful; strongly agree: It could hardly have been better! 5 stars, no doubt about that... :)
- Neutral/Undecided (if you don't know or cant decide)  If this is your answer please provide more information on why it wasnt possible to make a decision. Were there some things missing? Was the process unclear at times and hard for understanding, making evaluation difficult
- Strongly agree: I really liked how we were treated as new employees; agreed with everything that was presented in orientation program! 5 stars from me :) - Agree (if you like it but have a few minor issues)  Generally positive about the onboarding process. There are some things to improve, however most of them could be easily fixed and would make this experience perfect for everyone
- Somewhat agree: I liked how we were treated as new employees; there is still room left before being completely satisfied with everything that was presented in orientation program (3 stars) - Disagree  The onboarding process wasnt what you expected. You have some suggestions or complaints about it, but not too many and they can be easily fixed
- Strongly disagree: I did NOT like the way we were treated as new employees at all! 1 star from me :( (Strongest dislike) - Somewhat Disagree  The onboarding process wasnt what you expected. You have some suggestions or complaints about it, and they are quite important to be fixed
- Please provide any additional comments regarding the orientation program for new employees? What did/didn't work well in your opinion; how can we make this experience better next time around so that everyone feels welcome from day one! Thank you very much.  - Is there anything specific thing missing or unclear about our onboarding process, which should be included to help new employees feel more comfortable and welcomed?
- Were the materials provided clear enough for understanding how things work in this company (either through manuals/guides etc.)  On a scale from 1 -5 please rate your experience with those resources. If you are not sure about something, just let me know! Im here to help and make onboarding better :).

This JSON object represents a questionnaire for evaluating the onboarding experience of new employees in a company. The questionnaire has four questions, each with a unique code, name, and type. The type of the questions is either 5 (rating) or 4 (feedback). The answers to the questions are given in the "_TF\_ANSWERS" array, and the display order of the questions is also specified.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do you feel pressure to perform well in your current role, or is it something that motivates and excites you about the job itself?(1 being very pressured)**
- Yes (pressurized) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If yes then give a detailed explanation on why they are feeling so much pressure at work place to perform better in their role, else no with reason for not performing well and what could be done about it? Also ask if there is any support available or resources that can help them feel less pressured
- No (not pressed) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If they are motivated by the job then give a detailed explanation on why do you enjoy your work, and what aspects make working in their role exciting? Also ask if there is any support or resources that can help them feel more engaged with their tasks
- Neutral (pressure neutral) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If they are neither motivated nor pressured then give a detailed explanation on why do you not have strong feelings about your work, and what could be done to make it better? Also ask if there is any support or resources that can help them feel more engaged with their tasks
- Somewhat (pressure somewhat) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If they are feeling some pressure then give a detailed explanation on why do you only sometimes experience stress, and what factors contribute to it? Also ask if there is any support or resources that can help them feel more in control when performing their tasks
- Strongly (pressure strongly) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If they are feeling a lot pressure then give a detailed explanation on why do you experience so much stress, and what aspects contribute to it? Also ask if there is any support or resources that can help them feel more in control when performing their tasks
- Can't say (pressure cannot) - 50% chance of getting this answer correct. If they are unable then give a detailed explanation on why do you not have an opinion about your work, and what could be done to make it better? [PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Recognition and Rewards

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Who are you in this organization, i.e., what is your role within the company hierarchy (please specify)?** 	    - CEO / President  
- Executive VicePresident or Senior Management Team Member (-1)    
- Middle Manager     
- Supervisor of a Department/Workgroup      
- Non--supervisory Employee       
- Other: ________________.

 **How long have you been with the company?** 	    - Less than one year  
- More than one, but less than five years (-1)    
- Between Five and Ten Years     
- Longer Than tenure (please specify).

***Have your contributions to this organization ever received any recognition or rewards in the form of:*** 	    - Monetary Rewards  
- Non--monetized Recognition, such as a certificate/trophy (-1)    
- Verbal appreciation from Superiors and Peers.     
- Other: ________________. (please specify). If yes please elaborate on the type of recognition or rewards you have received?***.*** 	    - Bonus  
- Promotion to a Higher Position      
- Employee Referral Program Rewards (-1)    
- Personal Development Plan Implemented by Superiors.     
- Other: ________________. (please specify). How often do you feel that your contributions are recognized and rewarded?***.*** 	    - Never  
- Less than once a year      
- Once or more per quarter (-1)    
- More Than Twice Per Year.     
- Other: ________________. (please specify). How do you feel about the recognition system in this organization?***.*** 	    - Very satisfied  
- Somewhat Satisfied      
- Neutral or Indifferent (-1)    
- Not very content with it.     
- Extremely dissatisfied and unhappy, would like to leave immediately if possible (please specify). If not then why?***.*** 	    - Yes  
- No but I am looking for a better opportunity elsewhere      
- Maybe in the future (-1)    
- Not sure.     
- Other: ________________. How often do you feel that your contributions are recognized and rewarded as they should be?***.*** 	    - Never  
- Less than once per year       
- Once or more every quarter (please specify). (-1)    
- More Than Twice Per Year.     
- Other: ________________. If you were given a chance to design the recognition and rewards system, how would it look like?***.*** 	    - Monetary Rewards  
- Non--monetized Recognition such as certificate/trophy (-1)    
- Verbal appreciation from Superiors.     
- Personal Development Plan Implemented by supervisors (please specify). If yes, how often and what is the process?***.*** 	    - Once a year  
- Twice per Year      
- Quarterly or Monthly (-1)    
- Other: ________________. Please elaborate on why you think this type of recognition/reward system would be ideal for your organization.
     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Recognition and Rewards

This JSON object represents a questionnaire with four questions. Each question has a unique code, content, type, display order, and a list of possible answers. The four questions are asking about the recognition and rewards system in an organization, and the different types of recognition/rewards that are valued. The questions are asking about the frequency and process of recognition, and why a certain type of recognition/reward system would be ideal. The display order of the questions can be adjusted.

=================================================================

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100012
     - Topic: Employee motivation
     - Question number: 5

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100042
     - Topic: Recognition and Rewards
     - Question number: 8
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Recognition and Rewards

 "ANSWER": "Agree"
 },

 "ANSWER": "Neutral"
 },

 "ANSWER": "Disagree"

 }
 }
 ]
 }
}

Please note that the answer options for questions with type ID 2 are not displayed in any particular order.

=================================================================

     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User:

[LLM ANSWER]
 **In your opinion, how would you rate our teambuilding activities and their effectiveness in building stronger teams at work (1 being not effective, 5 being very good)? Please provide ratings for each activity separately.**
- Team Building Activity A: ________ / 5
- Team Building Activity B: __________/ 5
... ... . .. etc. up to a maximum of five activities mentioned in the same format as above (1=not effective, and number on top i.e., 5 is very good) for each activity separately so that we can understand which one was more or less successful than others! If there are fewer then just put all team building initiatives together
- Team Building Activity X: ________ / 5 <=== (1=not effective, and number on top i.e., 5 is very good) for each activity separately so that we can understand which one was more or less successful than others! If there are fewer then just put all team building initiatives together
**Do you think the company should invest in teambuilding activities? Please provide a rating (1 being no, and number on top i.e., 5 is yes). And please also mention why do/don't feel free to elaborate.** <=== This one will be single not multiple as it has only two options
- Company investing time & money in teambuilding: ________ / 2 (1=no, and number on top i.e.,5 is yes) for each activity separately so that we can understand which was more or less successful than others! If there are fewer then just put all team building initiatives together
**Do you think the activities were inclusive of everyone? Please provide a rating with 1 being not at ALL and number on top i.e.,5 is yes)** <=== This one will be single as it has only two options, so no need to mention multiple times! Just write: Company investing time & money in teambuilding (Single)
- Team Building Activity A inclusive of everyone? ________ / 2(1=not at ALL and number on top i.e.,5 is yes)** <=== This one will be single as it has only two options, so no need to mention multiple times! Just write: Company investing time & money in teambuilding (Single)

Generate me a questionnaire on Training and Development Programs

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role in this organization: Executive, Manager, Staff Member / Employee ?** 	- CEO  	    - CTO    	      - Senior Vice President       |          X|---------------------------         HR Director       ---------------            VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------
```vbnet
How would you rate the training and development programs offered by your company? (1 being very poor, 5 is excellent)   ----    -------     ---------               - Very good  	- Good       |---------------------         X|---------------          VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------        Manager           -----------
```vbnet
Have you ever participated in a training and development program offered by your company?  (Yes / No)   ----    -------     ---------               - Yes  	-No       |---------------------         X|---------------          VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------        Manager           -----------
```vbnet
Do you think that the programs are tailored to meet specific needs and roles? (Yes / No)   ----    -------     ---------               - Yes  	-No       |---------------------         X|---------------          VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------        Manager           -----------  How often do training sessions take place in your company ?
```
(More than once a month, Once per Month , Less then that)   ----    -------     ---------               - More Than One Percent  	- Yes       |---------------------         X|---------------          VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------        Manager           -----------  Do you think the training and development programs are accessible to all employees? (Yes / No )
```vbnet   ----    -------     ---------               - YES             ---  	-NO       |---------------------         X|---------------          VP of Engineering--------------           Line manager                             -------------        Manager           -----------  Have you ever received feedback on the training and development programs that your company offers?
